name: Cookie Adventure (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Description: This is a platformer about a lonely cookie who has been outcasted from his cookie jar and he needs to find his way back home. Move through the maze and go through portals to try and find a way to get to the cookie jar without touching the acid or spikes.

Instructions: The cookie can switch gravity at will using the spacebar. Use the arrow keys and the spacebar to help the cookie navigate the challenging terrain and avoid falling into acid to win honor for his family and to get back to the cookie jar!
